hypothesis_content.title: Memecoin Liquidity Spike Fade on PEPE/DOGE
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes, when PEPE or DOGE experiences a >40% price spike on >300% volume surge relative to 20-day average, it will mean-revert 50-70% of that spike within 48 hours as holiday liquidity exaggerates pump-and-dump patterns.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Memecoins are particularly susceptible to liquidity-driven pumps during holidays when normal market depth is absent. The combination of extreme overbought readings and unsustainable volume suggests imminent profit-taking.
entry_conditions: Time is between Dec 20 and Jan 5

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 60% of the initial 40% spike
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price makes new high above spike peak

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: >35% of such spikes continue upward another 20%+ instead of reversing within 48 hours.
